snippet.title: Gold of Skulls: Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Add Gold of Skulls to your wishlist on VK Play: https://vkplay.ru/play/game/gold_of_skulls/

GOLD OF SKULLS is an exciting new Free-to-Play client-based collectible card game for Windows PCs. Crafted by seasoned Russian developers with backgrounds at Netflix and Disney, the game melds heroic turn-based auto-battling with rich RPG elements and sophisticated tactical gameplay.

In both PvP and PvE modes, players will command their personally curated party of mythical and fantastical heroes in a realm where the boundaries between life and death blur.

Delving deeper, players will encounter a diverse array of meticulously designed heroes, each equipped with unique abilities, weapons, and artifacts. This depth allows for an almost limitless array of strategic possibilities and tactics. Gold of Skulls presents a novel approach to card games, ensuring a memorable and truly spectacular gaming experience.

Stay updated and join us on a thrilling and shadowy adventure by following our social media:

VK Play: https://vkplay.ru/play/game/gold_of_skulls/

🎮 Gold of Skulls: https://goldofskulls.gameless.one
🕹️ Gameless Studio: https://www.gameless.one
💬 Discord: https://discord.gg/goldofskulls
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/gameless_ofcl
📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gameless_ofcl

#GoldofSkulls #game #gameplay #fantasy #ccg #cardgame #gameless #gamedev #topgames #vkplay
